item.title: Starting on the Python Challenges
item.description: Today shall be the official start to completing the Python Challenges by Pybites. Though technically I started it last week. Pybites has a long list of about 60 Python Challenges on their website, ranging from simple games to API calls for web servers. I think this is going to be a good opportunity to bring my Python skills to the next level, and hopefully inspire me to be able to start on my own personal project!
